entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:06 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.6°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
